title: The Blade of Frontiers
content: yll confronted Karlach in our camp, believing her to be a dangerous devil. We resolved the situation peacefully and recruited Wyll to our party. We should get to know him better. A monster hunter named Wyll confronted Karlach in our camp, believing her to be a dangerous devil. We slayed Karlach and recruited Wyll to our party. We should get to know him better. We located Karlach, who was not the treacherous devil Wyll believed her to be. We resolved the situation peacefully, but Wyll owes us an
